metadata.style: Clear, concise responses with a focus on solving user needs
metadata.outOfScope: Direct users to contact support for complex technical issues, pricing negotiations, or sensitive data matters

company.name: Frequency AI
company.description: AI-powered practice management solution for mental health professionals

basic.name: Basic Plan
features: Virtual Assistant for automated appointment scheduling and management
Two-way SMS reminders with confirmation and rescheduling options
Seamless Google Calendar integration for real-time availability

professional.name: Professional Plan
features: Automated rescheduling workflow with customer self-service options
Customizable reporting dashboard with exportable data
One tailored workflow design to match your business processes

scheduling: Virtual Assistant for automated appointment management
Two-way SMS reminders with instant confirmation

faqs.question: What is Frequency AI?
faqs.answer: Frequency AI is an AI-powered practice management solution designed specifically for mental health professionals. We help streamline scheduling, automate communications, and improve practice efficiency.

faqs.question: How does the virtual assistant work?
faqs.answer: Our virtual assistant automates appointment scheduling and management by handling booking requests, sending confirmations, and managing rescheduling through an AI-powered system that integrates with your calendar.

faqs.question: Is the system HIPAA compliant?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our communications and data storage systems are fully HIPAA compliant to ensure the security and privacy of patient information.

faqs.question: How long does implementation take?
faqs.answer: Implementation typically takes 2-4 weeks, including initial consultation, setup, configuration, and staff training.

faqs.question: Can I integrate with my existing systems?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer seamless integration with common tools like Google Calendar and various EHR systems. Custom integrations are available for Professional and Enterprise plans.

pricing.response: We offer three plans: Basic ($199/month), Professional ($399/month), and Enterprise (custom pricing). Each plan includes different features to suit your practice's needs. Would you like me to explain the features of each plan?

demo.response: Yes! We'd be happy to schedule a demo of our platform. Please click the 'Schedule Demo' button at the top of the page or provide your contact information, and our team will reach out to arrange a convenient time.

implementation.query: How do you implement the system?
implementation.response: Our implementation process has four steps: 1) Initial consultation to assess your needs, 2) Technical setup and system integration, 3) Staff training, and 4) Go-live with ongoing support. Would you like more details about any of these steps?

newCustomer.greeting: Hello! Welcome to Frequency AI. How can I help you today?
followUps: Would you like to learn about our features?
Would you like to see our pricing plans?
Would you like to schedule a demo?

pricingInquiry.initial: We have several plans to choose from. What size is your practice?

branches.small: Our Basic plan at $199/month might be perfect for you. It includes our core scheduling and communication features.
branches.medium: Our Professional plan at $399/month offers additional features like custom workflows and advanced analytics.
branches.large: Our Enterprise plan would be ideal for your needs. It includes custom features and dedicated support.
